ee.ria.dhx.ws.service

Interface DhxPackageProviderService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DhxPackageProviderServiceImpl

    public interface DhxPackageProviderService
    Provides Dhx packages to send using DHX protocol. Multiple methods to get outgoing packages are provided. Besides the document that is being sent, package contains information about sender, recipient and consignmentId.
    Author:
    Aleksei Kokarev

    • Method Detail

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. Package recipient is defined in input. Default sender from configuration will be set as X-road sender. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipient - - to whom the document is sent
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while creating package

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember sender)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. Package recipient is defined in input. X-road sender is put from sender input parameter. Use this method if sender differs from the one configured as default(for example if sending from non default subsystem or if representee is sending the document). No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipient - - to whom the document is sent
        sender - - xroadMember representing sender of the document. Can be used if sender differs from the one from configuration or for example to send document from another(different from default configured) subsystem
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember sender)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. Package recipient is defined in input. Sender parameter will be put as X-road sender. Use this method if sender differs from the one configured as default(for example if sending from non default subsystem or if representee is sending the document). No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipient - - to whom the document is sent
        sender - - xroadMember representing sender of the document. Can be used if sender differs from the one from configuration or for example to send document from another(different from default configured) subsystem
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException

        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. Package recipient is defined in input. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem,
                                                       java.lang.String senderSubsystem)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. Package recipient is defined in input. senderSubsystem represents X-road subSystem which will used to send the document. Use this method if sending from same X-road member as configured but from non default subsystem. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        senderSubsystem - - X-road subsytem of the sender to use when sending the document
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem,
                                                       java.lang.String senderMemberCode,
                                                       java.lang.String senderSubsystem)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. Package recipient is defined in input. Sender is defined in input by senderMemberCode and senderSubsystem. Use this method if sender differs from the configuder default. For example if sending from behalf of representee. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration.XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        senderMemberCode - - X-road member code of the sender to use when sending the document
        senderSubsystem - - X-road subsytem of the sender to use when sending the document
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem,
                                                       java.lang.String senderMemberCode,
                                                       java.lang.String senderSubsystem)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. No capsule parsing is done and package recipient is defined in input. Sender is defined in input by senderMemberCode and senderSubsystem. Use this method if sender differs from the configuder default. For example if sending from behalf of representee. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        senderMemberCode - - X-road member code of the sender to use when sending the document
        senderSubsystem - - X-road subsytem of the sender to use when sending the document
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. No capsule parsing is done and package recipient is defined in input. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem,
                                                       java.lang.String senderSubsystem)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. No capsule parsing is done and package recipient is defined in input. senderSubsystem represents X-road subSystem which will be used to send the document. Use this method if sending from same X-road member as configured but from non default subsystem. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        senderSubsystem - - X-road subsytem of the sender to use when sending the document
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientCode,
                                                       java.lang.String recipientSystem,
                                                       java.lang.String senderMemberCode,
                                                       java.lang.String senderSubsystem,
                                                       java.io.InputStream schemaStream,
                                                       java.lang.String dhxProtocolVersion)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. No capsule parsing is done and package recipient is defined in input. Sender is defined in input by senderMemberCode and senderSubsystem. Use this method if sender differs from the configuder default. For example if sending from behalf of representee. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema from input is used for validation. Protocol version from input is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipientCode - - to whom document is sent. registry code of the recipient or representee
        recipientSystem - - system of the recipient to send to. NULL if sending to default DHX system.
        senderMemberCode - - X-road member code of the sender to use when sending the document
        senderSubsystem - - X-road subsytem of the sender to use when sending the document
        schemaStream - - stream of the XSD schema to use for capsule validation.
        dhxProtocolVersion - - dhx protocol version to set to SOAP request that will be sent
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember sender,
                                                       java.io.InputStream schemaStream,
                                                       java.lang.String dhxProtocolVersion)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. No capsule parsing is done and package recipient is defined in input. Sender parameter will be put as X-road sender. Use this method if sender differs from the configuder default. For example if sending from behalf of representee. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema from input is used for validation. Protocol version from input is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipient - - to whom the document is sent
        sender - - xroadMember representing sender of the document. Can be used if sender differs from the one from configuration or for example to send document from another(different from default configured) subsystem
        schemaStream - - stream of the XSD schema to use for capsule validation.
        dhxProtocolVersion - - dhx protocol version to set to SOAP request that will be sent
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember recipient,
                                                       ee.ria.dhx.types.InternalXroadMember sender,
                                                       java.io.InputStream schemaStream,
                                                       java.lang.String dhxProtocolVersion)
                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Get outgoing package. No capsule parsing is done and package recipient is defined in input. Sender parameter will be put as X-road sender. Use this method if sender differs from the configuder default. For example if sending from behalf of representee. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema from input is used for validation. Protocol version from input is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        recipient - - to whom the document is sent
        sender - - xroadMember representing sender of the document. Can be used if sender differs from the one from configuration or for example to send document from another(different from default configured) subsystem
        schemaStream - - stream of the XSD schema to use for capsule validation.
        dhxProtocolVersion - - dhx protocol version to set to SOAP request that will be sent
        Returns:
        - OutgoingDhxPackage
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        java.util.List<ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage> getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId)
                                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Deprecated. it is not always possible to define recipient from capsule recipient. For example if multiple subsystems are present. Use methods with defined recipient in input
        Get outgoing package. Parses capsule from file and creates package for each adressee defined in capsule. Uses default capsule version from configuration to parse capsule. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        Returns:
        - outgoing package list
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        java.util.List<ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage> getOutgoingPackage(java.io.File capsuleFile,
                                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                                       ee.ria.dhx.util.CapsuleVersionEnum version)
                                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Deprecated. it is not always possible to define recipient from capsule recipient. For example if multiple subsystems are present. Use methods with defined recipient in input
        Parses capsule from file and sends document. Document is sent to every recipient defined in capsule. Uses default capsule version from configuration to parse capsule. No capsule parsing is done, only validation if it is enabled in configuration. XSD schema of current capsule defined in configuration is used to validate capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleFile - - file to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        version - - version of the capsule to parse
        Returns:
        - outgoing package list
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        java.util.List<ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage> getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId)
                                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Deprecated. it is not always possible to define recipient from capsule recipient. For example if multiple subsystems are present. Use methods with defined recipient in input
        Parses capsule from file and sends document. Document is sent to every recipient defined in capsule. Uses default capsule version from configuration to parse capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        Returns:
        - outgoing package list
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document

      • getOutgoingPackage

        java.util.List<ee.ria.dhx.types.OutgoingDhxPackage> getOutgoingPackage(java.io.InputStream capsuleStream,
                                                                       java.lang.String consignmentId,
                                                                       ee.ria.dhx.util.CapsuleVersionEnum version)
                                                                throws ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException
        Deprecated. it is not always possible to define recipient from capsule recipient. For example if multiple subsystems are present. Use methods with defined recipient in input
        Parses capsule from file and sends document. Document is sent to every recipient defined in capsule. Uses default capsule version from configuration to parse capsule. Protocol version from configuration is used.
        Parameters:
        capsuleStream - - stream to send
        consignmentId - - consignment id of the document
        version - - version of the capsule to parse
        Returns:
        - outgoing package list
        Throws:
        ee.ria.dhx.exception.DhxException - - thrown if error occurs while sending document
